definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

sentences.english: Bacon still remains one of the top movie stars in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 而貝肯仍舊是好萊塢數一數二的電影明星。

sentences.english: Gianna Jun puts on a brave show in her Hollywood debut.
sentences.chinese: 全智賢在她好萊塢的處女作中表現英勇。

sentences.english: It is often said that Hollywood is  high school with money.
sentences.chinese: 人們常常說說好萊塢就是“紙醉金迷的高中”。

sentences.english: The day a Chinese multi-billionaire takes over Hollywood will be the time hell freezes over.
sentences.chinese: 中國億萬富翁接管好萊塢的那一天地獄都會凍結。

sentences.english: Hollywood can make the most famous film stars in the world.
sentences.chinese: 好萊塢可以造就世界上最著名的影星。

sentences.english: Viridian has assembled one of the best creative teams in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 維瑞點這次聚集好萊塢最賦創造力的團隊。

sentences.english: SAG is currently the only Hollywood union not to have a new contract.
sentences.chinese: 目前演員工會是好萊塢唯一沒有新合同的組織。

sentences.english: Hollywood seems equally eager to do so.
sentences.chinese: 好萊塢似乎也正有此意。

sentences.english: You can go to Hollywood. And you can go see the museums and everything.
sentences.chinese: 你還可以參觀好萊塢，各種博物館等等。

sentences.english: Do you still remember the casper in the movie of Hollywood?
sentences.chinese: 還記得好萊塢電影裏的小精靈嗎？

sentences.english: This is the stuff of Hollywood.
My address is 9 Hollywood Road, Kensington.
sentences.chinese: 我的地址是肯星頓好萊塢路9號。

sentences.english: Explain the political set-up in Hollywood to people who don't work here.
sentences.chinese: 爲不在好萊塢工作的人們解釋一下這裏的政治結構吧。

sentences.english: Conforming to this theme, a large number of anti-terrorism films have been made in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 好萊塢順應時代主題而拍攝出了一大批反恐影視劇作。

sentences.english: Musicals were normally filmed on sets built in Hollywood to look like other places.
sentences.chinese: 音樂劇是在好萊塢拍攝通常看起來像建其他地方臺。

definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
